section.p: Not taking any chances, you charge the soldier, yelling a warcry. He starts back in astonishment. Just then, several archers pop up from behind the rocks above, and let loose a volley of arrows. One takes you in the leg. Lose 3 Stamina points.

If you still live, you fall to one knee, and the soldier melts away into the rocks. Alone, and wounded in the leg, you cannot climb upwards. You have to go back down though the descent will be difficult with a dodgy leg.
Roll a die , adding 1 if you have some climbing gear.
